Admission requirements for international students|George Brown College Admission Requirements

For candidates from Nigeria their specific country Academic requirements are listed as follows:

  • WAEC certificate or NECO certificate and as well Online Verification PIN
  • English: A1-B3.
  • Math: A1-B3.
  • Four other academic courses A1-B3 are required.

Other Supporting Credentials Required:

  • Translated and attested copies of High School qualification.
  • Translated and attested copies of transcripts of study are required.

 

Please be notify that we do note accept study gaps more than five years.

English Language Aptitude Test requirements|George Brown Admission Requirements

The following maximum scores are required:

Source Diploma / Certificate Postgraduate / FAST-TRACK / BRIDGES GBC Degree Programs
George Brown English for Academic Purposes (EAP) Program Level 8 Level 9 Level 9
IELTS (Academic) 6.0, minimum 5.5 in each skill band 6.5, minimum 6.0 in each skill band 6.5, minimum 6.0 in each skill band
TOEFL 80 (online) minimum 20 in each skill band 88 (online) maximum 22 in each skill band 84 (online) maximum 21 in each skill band
Duolingo English Test 105 125 115
MELAB 80 85 85
PTE (Academic) 54, overall minimum
50 in each skill band		 60, overall minimum
55 in each skill band		 60, in general a maximum grade score 55   is required in each skill band
CAEL 60 (overall) 70 overall (writing 60) 70 in general (writing 60)
Cambridge English Exams (B2 First, C1 Advanced or C2 Proficiency) 169 or more (with no individual skill below 162) 176 or more (with no individual skill below 169) 176 or more (with no individual skill below 169)

 George Brown College Admission Application Deadlines for 2024

Program Intake September 2024 Start January 2024 Start May 2024 Start
Intake open for application submission December 13, 2024 April 4, 2024 August 2, 2024
Application assess and Offer issuance begins January 31, 2024 June 20, 2024 October 17, 2024
First day of classes September 6, 2024 January 9, 2024 May 8, 2024

 

Degree Programs Application Fees.

 

Application Fee $95
Base Tuition Fee $18,190 for 2 semesters (2024-2024 Programs)
supplementary Fees (student ID, student association membership, etc) $2,000
compulsory Health Insurance $743.99 for one-year treatment (Sept-August)
$508.83 for 8 months treatment (Jan-August)
$273.29 for 4 months treatment (May-August)
Public Transportation (per year), estimated $1,500
Books and Supplies (estimated per year, post-secondary programs) $1,000-$1,200

Steps for online Application into George Brown College

  • Click here to start application.
  • Fill in the appropriate details
  • Be sure the name is written as seen in tour passport
  • Click on create
